item.title: MSc in Disaster Interventions and Humanitarian Aid: Lena Dominelli
item.description: MD - Michelle Drumm KM - Kerry Musselbrook LM - Lena Dominelli MD Lena Dominelli is Professor of Social Work at the University of Stirling and Chair of the International Association of Schools of Social Work (IASSW) Disaster Intervention, Climate Change and Sustainability Committee. Kerry Musselbrook from Iriss had a conversation with her about the new MSc in Disaster Interventions and Humanitarian Aid at University of Stirling, why this matters, and what it means for social work.
